title.label: Worst tower defense experience I‚Äôve had, wish i could get a refund

content.label: The game is fun for the first 2-3 levels (about 5 minutes of playing) after that the difficulty even on casual mode is EXTREME, after the first 4 levels additional purchases are required to continue he game. The developers should be forced to refund the purchase price of the game and not allowed to develop apps anymore... thieves

title.label: PLEASE ADD A CONFIRM RESTART BUTTON

content.label:
I love this game as the whole series. Easily 10/10 for me. And I know this game was the second game in 4 and why would they come back to fix stuff here? Well, they forgot to add a button on the pause menu that confirms you want to restart a level instead of just INSTANTLY RESTARTING THE LEVEL. I made it all the way to the end of the game and pause to savor the moment and then BAM! Slip of the thumb! All the way back to start!
Anyway buy the game it‚Äôs great.
I love this game. I‚Äôve played the original version of kingdom rush forever, and then this comes out and it was just great. I like the desert twist in it, with the assassins and all

title.label: Every bit as good as the original

content.label:
The original Kingdom Rush is easily the best tower defense game I've ever played.  Yes, this game doesn't bring a radically new experience to the table, but nothing really needed to be changed about the first game.  

Yes, there are in-app purchases of better heroes.  You definitely don't need to buy them to progress. If things are too hard for you and you'd like to progress faster, just lower the difficulty level.  I played through the whole first game on Normal without buying anything.  Anyone who complains about how much the heroes cost needs to shut up and choose one of the first three heroes (I like the third one the best in this game, but you don't get him until after you beat level 7). 

It's a joy to play a game with this much polish and care and attention to detail. Thanks for making a great game!

Bought an HD version of one of these a few days ago and it looked great. So I bought this next. It looks terrible by comparison. Doesn‚Äôt fit the screen is the biggest drawback. Just wasted how ever much this cost. I do not recommend this game.

title.label: Long time fan, purchase restoration: Return of the review

content.label:
Hello, it‚Äôs me again. I‚Äôm here to elaborate on my issue with my restoration purchase. Currently, on Kingdom Rush: Frontiers, I cannot restore my hero's. And why this is odd as I still have the same Apple ID I used to purchase said hero's (all of them) on my old iPad. So clearly, I have no idea what‚Äôs going on. I‚Äôm not here to restore my origins, nor anything else but my Frontiers hero‚Äôs. If that‚Äôs not possible, I‚Äôd just like to forward this in general to see if I can get a response and see if anything is wrong with the game or myself. Thank you, IronHide Studios. 

P.S Can‚Äôt wait for your next game! Keep the quality up and I‚Äôll save my money to purchase them eventually!
Loveeeeee this game. I just wish there were more levels. Especially if I have to pay for it but overall it‚Äôs worth it
I enjoy the art style and game mechanics but there is no sound. I‚Äôve reinstalled but same problem. Too bad.
It‚Äôs a bummer that a game you pay for constantly waves ‚Äúbuy more gems and heroes‚Äù ads in your face. Fun TD with great art, but the micro transactions really bum me out.

title.label: Can‚Äôt watch adds/videos to get gems

content.label: In the last 2 days I can‚Äôt watch the adds/videos to get those free 100 gems. As soon as I click on it, it closes the window. Are there are known issues with that? Other than that the game is awesome!
I‚Äôve beaten the entire game on veteran and have had a blast the whole time. The diverse group of towers and enemies make every level feel unique. Very solid game.

title.label: Ironhide Studios are the Best game developers

content.label: I absolutely love this game and the franchise as I‚Äôve been playing your games on and off and every time I played it was a flood of good memories when I was younger. I would often use my family‚Äôs computer to play Kingdom Rush Frontiers which was the first tower defense game I played and really got me into the tower defense genre. The towers in each game felt new and improved with cool ideas like having musketeers and wizards that summon the dead. When I went to check on games to play because I was bored I saw these games were for free. I am truly happy that one of my favorite games is for free and you guys had the kindness to make it free so people like me wouldn‚Äôt get bored during the Covid-19 lockdown break.
A true classic!

I can‚Äôt stop. It‚Äôs challenging. It‚Äôs super fun and creative. The game develops really well. NO ADs!! I haven‚Äôt bought anything.. yet. I will just because I appreciate the game and it‚Äôs developers.

title.label: Cool üòé (i see what you did there )

content.label: I‚Äôm not questioning why all of a sudden kingdom rush is free when back then it was not,but I know why you did what you did,you know,with covid-19 out there outdoors activities are at all-time low so kids have to find other ways to entertain themselves so you took this chance to take your down loads higher than ever,also with the kingdom rush games being 4.99 and what not and how people can‚Äôt really work anymore you realized people won‚Äôt be able to pay for it (or at least something as trivial as kingdom rush )

I don‚Äôt normally write reviews, but I have been playing this game on and off for YEARS now and it‚Äôs been really fun every time.

The ‚Äúgems‚Äù are not only affordable, but you can get A LOT of them for free by watching adds. They‚Äôre not NEEDED, they just make the game a little easier.  I‚Äôve gotten so many from adds. There doesn‚Äôt seem to be a limit as to how many you can get per day for free. Most games cap this so low that it‚Äôs not even worth it. All THREE of these games from this company that I‚Äôve played share this trait, so kids can really get into it without buying anything! (Kingdom Rush and Origins)

The level progression is fun, challenging and makes you really think about the placement of your towers, they level up as you level up, it‚Äôs really diverse and interesting. I HIGHLY recommend it.
You lose a star for charging for both installation and the best in-app content.
Played all the kingdom rush games and they are all unique and absolutely incredible. This one is the most difficult in my opinion but that hasn‚Äôt stopped me from full starring it.
Great game I love it. I‚Äôd give it 5 stars if it had more levels. I‚Äôve beat the game twice so that‚Äôs enough to tell you I really like it but there aren‚Äôt enough levels.
I  LOVE THIS GAME, each ironhide game gets better
They are trying to make money there other game kingdom rush is amazing I like it because there are no ads it is pretty fun please keep making more games like this

Kingdom Rush and all its successors (Frontiers, Origins, Vengeance) are some of the most high quality tower defense games out there. With addicting and challenging gameplay paired with detailed and stunning graphics, Kingdom Rush is without a doubt a must-play game.
I love this game! It is money well spent. The graphics alone are a standout and overall game play challenges you to step your game up!
The tower of reganos has the words ‚ÄúSPECIAL_NEPTUNE_TOWER_UPGRADE_NOTE‚Äù when i try to upgrade it. just thought i should point this out. amazing game & series!
Better than the first
This game is hard, but really fun! There are so many references like the stargate and Star Wars reference!

This game and the first one immediately sucked me in. The game mechanics are easy to learn and challenging to master, which makes strategic thinking and resource planning feel more rewarding. Each map requires a different plan and different priories, so you're forced to think up new approaches often. 

I love the art style. It's colorful and dynamic, but also doesn't feel like there's so much going on on the screen that it's overwhelming to look at.

The in app purchases do not feel at all intrusive or compulsory and you can complete the whole game without having to spend additional $. You earn plenty of in-game currency just by completing levels with 2-3 stars.
Most balanced and challenging
Love it üïõüïíüïïüïò
I love this game but the sound stopped working!! I've tried everything my iPad settings the game settings restarting the app restarting the iPad re installing the game...

title.label: The only good thing is it‚Äôs cute

content.label:
I really don‚Äôt understand all the rave reviews. At all. I got one of these games because it was free that day and forgot to play. Got another because I saw it was free and remembered the series, played a few levels, thought, aww, it‚Äôs cute, and felt bad about the two free ones so I bought the third. So I have 3 of them, and I‚Äôve played them all through the main levels, veteran, and on the two ‚Äúharder‚Äù levels purely because I‚Äôm stubborn af, but I feel I can speak with authority.

The balance is *awful.* I probably wouldn‚Äôt have played veteran, but I quickly discovered that there‚Äôs just no appreciable difference between casual and veteran play, in spite of the illustrations of the cute little wide-eyed novice hero contrasted with the grizzled, brutish veteran. If you can beat a main level, I promise you can beat it on veteran. So... why bother to have a pretend sliding scale? And that‚Äôs for all three games. Also, for plenty of levels the ‚Äúchallenge‚Äù versions are actually significantly easier, which is also weird. 

But then the extra levels that open after you beat the main quest? Okay, maybe they just are too hard for me, (again though, it‚Äôs a weirdly steep jump in skill requirement then because I can get through even the hard main levels with a few tries) but as far as I can figure they‚Äôre less strategy game and more watch-the-included-video-and-do-exactly-what-they-did. And I mean EXACTLY. It‚Äôs not enough to place the towers they say, where they say, and upgrade to the version they say, but you, you upgraded the mage tower on the left by one before you upgraded the mage tower on the right path by one? Nope, you‚Äôre defeated, start over. Like I said, less strategy than Simon-says, so why bother to pretend? But I‚Äôd forgive the unnecessarily ‚Äúdifficult‚Äù (only beatable with their EXACT strategy) extra levels if the main levels were better balanced. 

I played this one first, out of order, and yeah, it‚Äôs cute, moderately fun through the main quests, with pointless ‚Äúbonus‚Äù levels. I‚Äôd probably have rated higher if my expectations hadn‚Äôt been raised by all the phenomenal reviews (that I seriously feel betrayed me xP ...what games did you people play??? Where do I download *those?) as it is I‚Äôm really let down. Kudos to the artist(s) though. 

(One extra note, other tower defenses I‚Äôve played have had some sort of speed toggles, which I would have liked on this one, since on harder levels that do require several tries, the first few waves are usually still pretty easy and slow to give you a chance to build up a bit before they slam you and it would be nice to have some way to speed the replay through those, especially if the wave that you‚Äôre struggling to figure out is a later one, like a new boss or group or combo that doesn‚Äôt show up until wave 10 of 15 or something? It would be nice to speed the timing on the first 9 to get back to 10, rather than having to wait on the spawn and movement speed as long as it takes to get back to it. This one isn‚Äôt a deal breaker, just something I‚Äôve seen in other games of this type that I kept looking for and being annoyed when I remembered *again it‚Äôs not a thing here so I just have to wait.)

Pros

‚Ä¢Progressive and fun profile building
‚Ä¢Great and easy to use mechanics
‚Ä¢Interface is easy to understandable and mostly responsive
‚Ä¢Deep roster of unlockable/playable characters 
‚Ä¢High replay value for hero building
‚Ä¢Just plain fun

Con‚Äôs
‚Ä¢Experienced some issues with response accuracy when commanding hero/unit. Could be device related
‚Ä¢My one major complaint is the Pause, Replay and Quit menu. In the heat of rounds it is easy to accidentally hit the pause button and accidentally quit the game. This has happened more than a few times. Very frustrating when in deep play. A Quit Confirmation would easily remedy this.

Keep up the awesome work IRONHIDE!!!

Also, you can only use a handful of hero‚Äôs before you have to use actual money but I don‚Äôt care. Still love this game!
